name: Finding Franklin
description:
This project was developed by Jordan. It was published by Black Frog Studios.

Zimbabwe the Cow and his good friend of Franklin the Sheep have decided to play a game: Franklin will hide and Zimbabwe will seek. Take control of Zimbabwe to parkour through the different villages ,set up by the escaped farm animals, to find Franklin.

Finding Franklin is a Franklin spinoff game. This means that it is set in the same universe as the other Franklin games, but it is not a part of the main Franklin story. This game takes place in between Franklin 2 and Franklin 3.

Controls:
Simple WASD movement, use mouse to look, and space to jump.

Versions:
1.0 - Launch Day build (July 18, 2020)

Credit to Jordan for art, code, music, and game design.
